creator: Yanstar Studio (Estonia)
descriptionHtml:
Civilians, the Undercover and Mr.White share the land of Undercover ^^

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies

Your clue is your secret word!

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉
• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Undercover ^^, like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, Spyfall and 谁是卧底, was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

KEY FEATURES:

1. Only 1 phone and 3+ participants are needed. You can play with up to 20 people at a time!

2. Internet connection is not required. Have fun playing anytime anywhere.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

-------------------------------------------------

Follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/undercover_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yanstarUndercover
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5Q9_KN-5MjPS8aCn6T3eQw
Our website: https://www.yanstarstudio.com/

This app contains graphics designed using resources from Freepik: https://www.freepik.com

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situation are sure to make Undercover ^^ one of the best party games you’ll play this year!
descriptionShort: A party game for 3-20 players 😎 Find the Undercover & Mr.White!

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

KEY FEATURES:

1. Only 1 phone and 3+ participants are needed. You can play with up to 20 people at a time!

2. Internet connection is not required. Have fun playing anytime anywhere.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

-------------------------------------------------

Civilians, the Undercover and Mr.White share the land of Undercover ^^

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies

Your clue is your secret word!

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉
• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Undercover ^^, like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, Spyfall and 谁是卧底, was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

KEY FEATURES:

1. Only 1 phone and 3+ participants are needed. You can play with up to 20 people at a time!

2. Internet connection is not required. Have fun playing anytime anywhere.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

-------------------------------------------------

Follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/undercover_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yanstarUndercover
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5Q9_KN-5MjPS8aCn6T3eQw
Our website: https://www.yanstarstudio.com/

This app contains graphics designed using resources from Freepik: https://www.freepik.com

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situation are sure to make Undercover ^^ one of the best party games you’ll play this year!
descriptionShort: A party game for 3-20 players 😎 Find the Undercover and Mr.White!

title: Undercover ^^

container.value: Harju maakond, Kuusalu vald, Pudisoo küla, Männimäe, 74626, Estonia

creator: Yanstar Studio OU
descriptionHtml:
Civilians, the Undercover and Mr.White share the land of Undercover ^^

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies

Your clue is your secret word!

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉
• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Undercover ^^, like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, Spyfall and 谁是卧底, was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

KEY FEATURES:

1. Only 1 phone and 3+ participants are needed. You can play with up to 20 people at a time!

2. Internet connection is not required. Have fun playing anytime anywhere.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

-------------------------------------------------

creator: Yanstar Studio OU
descriptionHtml:
Civilians, the Undercover and Mr.White share the land of Undercover ^^

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies

Your clue is your secret word!

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉
• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Undercover ^^, like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, Spyfall and 谁是卧底, was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

KEY FEATURES:

1. Only 1 phone and 3+ participants are needed. You can play with up to 20 people at a time!

2. Internet connection is not required. Have fun playing anytime anywhere.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

-------------------------------------------------

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉

• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Undercover ^^, like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, Spyfall, Among Us and 谁是卧底, was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

title: Undercover ^^

container.value: Harju maakond, Kuusalu vald, Pudisoo küla, Männimäe, 74626, Estonia

creator: Yanstar Studio OU
descriptionHtml:
Undercover ^^ is a group game you can play online or offline, with friends or with strangers!

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies

Your clue is your secret word!

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉

• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Undercover ^^, like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, Spyfall, Among Us and 谁是卧底, was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Goal: You must find out the other players’ identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

For more details, check this video on the Undercover ^^ Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x_l7Am7v7XM

-------------------------------------------------

Follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/undercover_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yanstarUndercover
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5Q9_KN-5MjPS8aCn6T3eQw
Our website: https://www.yanstarstudio.com/

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situation are sure to make Undercover ^^ one of the best party games you’ll play this year!

-------------------------------------------------

Undercover ^^ is a group game you can play online or offline, with friends or with strangers!

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies.

Your clue is your secret word.

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉

• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, or Among Us, Undercover ^^ was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets the ^^ sign…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover ^^ one of the best party games you’ll play this year!
descriptionShort: Find the impostors among you, online or offline, with friends or with strangers!

title: Undercover: the Forgetful Spy

container.value: Harju maakond, Kuusalu vald, Pudisoo küla, Männimäe, 74626, Estonia

creator: Yanstar Studio OU
descriptionHtml:
Undercover is a group game you can play online or offline, with friends or with strangers!

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies.

Your clue is your secret word.

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉

• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, or Spyfall, Undercover was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

You are at the right place! Like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, or Spyfall, Undercover was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!

You are at the right place! Like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, or Spyfall, Undercover was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!

creator: Yanstar Studio OU
descriptionHtml:
Undercover is a group game you can play online or offline, with friends or with strangers!

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies.

Your clue is your secret word.

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉

• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, or Spyfall, Undercover was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!
descriptionShort: A party game to play online or offline with friends or strangers

title:
Undercover: the Forgetful Spy
4.1.7

container.value: Harju maakond, Kuusalu vald, Pudisoo küla, Männimäe, 74626, Estonia

creator: Yanstar Studio OU
descriptionHtml:
Undercover is a group game you can play online or offline, with friends or with strangers!

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies.

Your clue is your secret word.

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉

• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, or Spyfall, Undercover was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, an Undercover or Mr.White.

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, or an Impostor (Undercover or Mr.White).

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!

container.value: Harju maakond, Kuusalu vald, Pudisoo küla, Männimäe, 74626, Estonia

creator: Yanstar Studio OU
descriptionHtml:
Undercover is a group game you can play online or offline, with friends or with strangers!

Your goal is to find out the other players' identities (and yours!) as fast as possible to eliminate your enemies.

Your clue is your secret word.

-------------------------------------------------

• Are you at a party, looking for a game which can engage everyone? 🎉

• Or thinking of a good way to interact with your friends and friends-to-be at a dinner, an outing, at work or even at school?

You are at the right place! Like icebreaker and party games Werewolf, Mafia, or Spyfall, Undercover was created to ensure active participation from everyone who can read and speak. Laughters and surprises are guaranteed! 😁

-------------------------------------------------

KEY FEATURES:

1. Offline mode: Everyone plays on the same phone. Players must be physically together.

2. Online mode: Play online with your friends or with strangers.

3. Our hand-picked word database ensures maximum engagement from people of different backgrounds.

4. Real-time ranking is displayed at the end of each round. Compare your Undercover skills to your friends’! 😎

-------------------------------------------------

BASIC RULES:

• Roles: You can be either a Civilian, or an Impostor (Undercover or Mr.White).

• Get your secret word: Pass the phone around to let each player choose their name and get a secret word! Civilians all receive the same word, the Undercover gets a slightly different word, and Mr.White gets no word at all…

• Describe your word: One by one, each player must give a short truthful description of their word. Mr.White must improvise.

• Time to vote: After discussion, vote to eliminate the person that seems to have a different word from yours. The app will then reveal the eliminated player’s role!

Tip: Mr.White wins if he guesses the Civilians' word correctly!

-------------------------------------------------

Creative thinking & strategy, combined with hilarious reversals of situations are sure to make Undercover one of the best party games you’ll play this year!
descriptionShort: Unmask the impostor, online or offline with friends or with strangers!
